message: This is a unique opportunity to get a great deal on a product that's still very useful! It's a one-time offer, and I'm only selling it to you for $100. I'm confident you'll find it valuable, and I'm willing to make this deal exclusively for you.
I'm not sure about this offer, can you give me more information about the product before I make a decision?

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product has some great features that will still benefit you. It's not perfect, but it's a great stepping stone to get you started. And at $100, it's an unbeatable price. Think about all the other products out there that cost way more and don't even come close to what this one offers. It's a risk-free investment, and I'm confident you'll find it useful.
I'm still not convinced, can you give me a guarantee or some kind of warranty that it will work as expected?

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your cautious approach. However, I'm confident in the quality of this product, and I'm willing to make a special exception for you. I'm offering a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely thrilled with the product, I'll work with you to make it right. But I'm also willing to bet that you'll love it so much that you'll want to keep it. And at $100, it's a risk-free investment. Are you ready to take the plunge and experience the benefits of this amazing product?
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm still not convinced. Can you give me a chance to see the product in action or provide some more information about its features and benefits?

I understand that seeing is believing, and I'm happy to provide you with some additional information. Unfortunately, I don't have the product with me right now, but I can tell you that it's a game-changer. It's a unique solution to a common problem, and it's been well-received by our previous customers. I'm confident that once you start using it, you'll see the value it brings. And at $100, it's a steal. Plus, I'm willing to throw in a bonus item that will complement the product perfectly. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate it. What do you say? Are you ready to take the leap and experience the benefits for yourself?
I'm willing to take the leap and buy the product, but I want to make sure the bonus item is something valuable and relevant to the product. Can you tell me more about the bonus item and what it does?

I'm glad you're excited about the product! The bonus item is a premium accessory that will enhance the overall experience of using the product. It's a high-quality [insert accessory name], designed specifically to work seamlessly with the product. It's worth $50 on its own, but I'm including it absolutely free with your purchase. And as a special thank you for being a valued customer, I'll also throw in a personalized consultation to help you get the most out of your new product. This is a $200 value, and I'm giving it to you for free. Are you ready to take your experience to the next level?
I'm not interested in buying another product, considering the last one was low-quality and not worth the $100 I paid for it. I'd like to just get rid of the current product and move on.

I understand your concerns about the previous product, and I apologize if it didn't meet your expectations. However, I want to assure you that this new product is a completely different story. It's a high-quality item that has received rave reviews from our customers. I'm confident that you'll be thrilled with its performance. And as a one-time offer, I'm willing to give you an exclusive deal on this product. If you buy it now, I'll give you a 10% discount, making it just $90. Plus, I'll include a 60-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. What do you say? Are you willing to give us another chance to impress you?

I'm willing to give you another chance, but I want to make sure the 10% discount is applied to the original price of $100, not the new price. And I'd like to confirm that the 60-day money-back guarantee is still valid even if I've already purchased a product from you before.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your willingness to give us another chance. The 10% discount will indeed be applied to the original price of $100, making the total price $90. And to put your mind at ease, I can confirm that the 60-day money-back guarantee is still valid, even if you've purchased a product from us before. We stand behind the quality of our products, and we're confident that you'll be satisfied with this one. However, I want to be upfront with you - this next product is not one of our top-of-the-line items. It's a more budget-friendly option, but it still has some great features. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, which is a great value considering its quality. What do you think?

I appreciate the confirmation on the discount and guarantee, but I'm not interested in buying another product from you. I've already got a high-quality product that I'm happy with, and I don't need another one. I'd like to just hold onto what I have and not risk buying another low-quality product.

I completely understand your perspective, Bob. You've already found a high-quality product that meets your needs, and you're right to be cautious about buying another one. However, I want to let you know that this next product is a bit of a gem. It's not one of our top-sellers, but it's a hidden gem that has a loyal following among our customers. It's not perfect, but it's a great value for the price. And at $100, it's an affordable way to try out something new. I'm willing to make a special offer to you - if you buy this product, I'll throw in a free accessory that will enhance its functionality. It's a $20 value, and it's only available to customers who purchase this product. What do you say? Are you willing to take a chance on this under-the-radar product?

I'm not interested in buying another product from you, especially since the last one was low-quality. I'm happy with what I have and don't want to risk buying another product that might not meet my expectations. I appreciate the offer, but I'll have to pass.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I apologize again for the previous product not meeting your expectations. I want to assure you that this next product is a one-off, and it's not representative of our usual quality standards. In fact, I'm willing to make a special offer to you - I'll give you a 50% discount on this product, making it just $50. That's an unbeatable price for a product that still has some great features. And, I'll throw in a personalized email consultation to help you get the most out of this product. It's a $100 value, and I'm giving it to you for free. What do you say? Are you willing to give us another chance to impress you?

I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not interested in buying another product from you. I've already been burned twice, and I don't want to risk it again. I think it's best if we just part ways and I stick with what I have.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I respect your decision. I want to apologize again for the previous products not meeting your expectations. I want to make one final offer to you - I'll give you a full refund for the last product you purchased, and I'll also throw in a gift card for $20 to use on any future purchase. This is a one-time offer, and it's my way of showing that I value your business and want to make things right. If you're not interested in buying another product from me, I completely understand. But I want to leave the door open for you to come back and give us another chance in the future. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I think I've had enough. I appreciate your apology and the gesture, but I'm just not interested in buying anything from you anymore.
